localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Superpowered is a calendar app in your menu bar. See your daily schedule and join meetings without having to go to your calendar. Download and get started in less than 1 minute!
nodes.title: Superpowered - Power through the day without your calendar
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
nodes.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced piÂ·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system â€œShareâ€ menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
nodes.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

nodes.excerpt: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they wonâ€™t pile up again.
nodes.title: Duplicates Monitor by Gemini 2 - Keep your Mac duplicate-free at all times
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Lens is a simple image converter for macOS. Just drop an image, or a bunch of them, and convert them to another format in a moment.
nodes.title: Lens - Convert images on the fly
nodes.author: Boris Lepikhin

nodes.excerpt: PastePal is the best universal pasteboard manager for Mac, iPhone and iPad. It is safe, fast and honor your privacy settings with a beautiful design.
nodes.title: PastePal 2.0 - Best universal pasteboard for Mac, iPhone and iPad
nodes.author: Khoa Pham

nodes.excerpt: Repeat is a productivity app with content and guidance for those of us just getting started and flexible options for the pros. There are no subscriptions, no ads and no selling your data.
nodes.title: Repeat - A simple but powerful habit tracker with no subscriptions
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Keyboard-driven commands to navigate your mac apps faster. No more funny breaks visiting dock just to move between apps! Switch's keyboard-centric interface allows for quick navigation between different applications.
nodes.title: Switch for macOS - Keyboard-driven commands to navigate your mac apps faster.
nodes.author: Victor Aremu

nodes.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
nodes.title: Agree - Polls with friends
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. ğŸš€ With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because this app was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's. ğŸ—‚ï¸
nodes.title: Doneit - Start accomplishing all your tasks quicker
nodes.author: Daniils

nodes.excerpt: OpenIn.app is an advanced Utility that helps you open links, emails and files in the application of your choice. Just click it, and select the application from the list. Including browsers for mailto, custom apps, and more
nodes.title: OpenIn.app - Open links, mails and files in the apps you want
nodes.author: Denis Gladkikh

nodes.excerpt: â¤ï¸ Open source ğŸ¤– Native ğŸ”Œ Plugin system âŒ¨ï¸ Custom hotkeys â¬†ï¸ Sort options by frequency of use ğŸ“¦ Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.

nodes.excerpt: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
nodes.title: Glyphs 3.0 - Build, edit and manage fonts on your Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
nodes.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch ğŸ’

nodes.excerpt: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. â € Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
nodes.title: Filma - High-end video editing on the go for iPhone, iPad and Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Quick Calc is a simple and easy-to-use calculator which can be directly accessed from the menu bar with the click of a button.
nodes.title: Quick Calc - An elegant calculator for your menu bar.
nodes.author: Aishanur Aydin

nodes.excerpt: Cocktail is a general purpose utility for macOS that lets you clean, repair and optimize your Mac. It is a powerful digital toolset that helps hundreds of thousands of Mac users around the world get the most out of their computers every day.
nodes.title: Cocktail - Clean, repair and optimize your Mac ğŸ¸
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
nodes.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job
nodes.author: Michael Samoylov

nodes.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
nodes.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
nodes.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window
nodes.author: Lucian Boiangiu

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina
